channel.title: No need for a cracked minecraft prob carrying virises
channel.description: you right now are probably like this :confused: how do i get minecraft for free??? Well the answer is simple. Get minecraft. :rolleyes: just read. You get minecraft from [url=http://minecraft.net]minecraft.net[/url] then get minecraft.exe. When you are running it press login, then press play offline. you are probably saying this: how do i go online, how do i get texture pax- shut up and listen. the way to get texture packs is going to be on another post. if you want to go online go to *, then look at the instructions on theyr youtube. And your all set

item.title: No need for a cracked minecraft prob carrying virises
item.dc:creator: @omgilikepie omgilikepie
item.description:
@omgilikepie wrote:

There are some younger kids who can’t pay for it because they don’t have a method of payment and their parents more than likely don’t trust them to buy stuff online with their credit/debit card. There are a few good other reasons I can think of that people can’t buy the game because of, but I don’t have time I should have left the house already to go to a family “get together” lol

Read full topic
item.source: No need for a cracked minecraft prob carrying virises

item.title: No need for a cracked minecraft prob carrying virises
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Idk why people even ‘crack’ minecraft, you are paying a 1 time fee of, $25?, which isnt much. Not to mention you are provided with free,frequent, updates. The endless hours of gameplay is well worth the cash.

At first i did crack it, just to see what it was like, i quickly got into it and decided to pay up, and it was well spent.

Read full topic

item.title: No need for a cracked minecraft prob carrying virises
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:2, topic:438781”][quote author=noobkillah10 link=topic=541487.msg3966627#msg3966627 date=1333768588]
you right now are probably like this how do i get minecraft for free??? Well the answer is simple. Get minecraft. :rolleyes: just read. You get minecraft from minecraft.net then get minecraft.exe. When you are running it press login, then press play offline. you are probably saying this: how do i go online, how do i get texture pax- shut up and listen. the way to get texture packs is going to be on another post. if you want to go online go to minecraftforfree.com, then look at the instructions on theyr youtube. And your all set
[/quote]
As used by hundreds of people, my cracked launcher contains no viruses. You can easily decompile the code and look at it and see that it simply only has the login process removed, and fetches the update number from a personal website. What was the point in posting this though? To advertise?[/quote]

funny thing is playing offline makes your user player

item.title: No need for a cracked minecraft prob carrying virises
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

noobkillah10:

you right now are probably like this how do i get minecraft for free??? Well the answer is simple. Get minecraft. :rolleyes: just read. You get minecraft from minecraft.net then get minecraft.exe. When you are running it press login, then press play offline. you are probably saying this: how do i go online, how do i get texture pax- shut up and listen. the way to get texture packs is going to be on another post. if you want to go online go to minecraftforfree.com, then look at the instructions on theyr youtube. And your all set

As used by hundreds of people, my cracked launcher contains no viruses. You can easily decompile the code and look at it and see that it simply only has the login process removed, and fetches the update number from a personal website. What was the point in posting this though? To advertise?
